# Kyora Agents — Quick Reference

Pick the agent by the folder you’re changing:

- `backend/**` → Backend Engineer
- `portal-web/**` → Frontend Engineer
- Backend + portal-web in one task → Fullstack Engineer
- `.github/**` agents/prompts/instructions → AI Architect
- UI consistency/tokens/components → UI Designer

## Prompts

- “Add a business-scoped orders view in portal-web” → Frontend Engineer
- “Add a business-scoped endpoint under /v1/businesses/:businessDescriptor” → Backend Engineer
- “Keep prompts/instructions consistent with SSOT” → AI Architect
